channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The 11 runtime attacks breaking AI security — and how CISOs are stopping them or can stop them
item.description: Enterprise security teams are losing ground to AI-enabled attacks — not because defenses are weak, but because the threat model has shifted. As AI agents move into production, attackers are exploiting runtime weaknesses where breakout times are measured in seconds, patch windows in hours, and traditional security has little visibility or control.CrowdStrike's 2025 Global Threat Report documents breakout times as fast as 51 seconds. Attackers are moving from initial access to lateral movement before most security teams get their first alert. The same report found 79% of detections were malware-...

item.title: Andy Serkis Talks About the Impossible Task of ‘The Hunt for Gollum’
item.description: 'The Lord of the Rings' star turned director is currently prepping the next 'Lord of the Rings' film, due in December 2027.

item.title: Black Mirror has been renewed for another season
item.description: In an interview with Netflix's Tudum, Black Mirror creator Charlie Brooker announced today that the sci-fi anthology series will be returning for an eighth season. "Well, luckily it does have a future, so I can confirm that Black Mirror will return, just in time for reality to catch up with it," Brooker said. "That chunk […]

item.title: This Ludicrously Light Headset Restored My Passion for VR
item.description: Pimax's Dream Air weighs less than my iPhone 17 and somehow has a micro OLED display with an 8K resolution.

item.title: Dell Pro Max 16 Plus mobile workstation review: Backpack-friendly desktop-class power with a beautiful display
item.description: The Dell Pro Max 16 Plus is an impressively powerful mobile workstation designed to take on any and all challenges you may throw at it in the professional workspace, all at the same time.

item.title: ExpressVPN two-year plans are up to 78 percent off right now
item.description:
ExpressVPN is back on sale again, and its two-year plans are up to 78 percent off right now. You can get the Advanced tier for $101 for 28 months. This is marked down from the $382 that this time frame normally costs. On a per-month basis, it works out to roughly $3.59 for the promo period.
We’ve consistently liked ExpressVPN because it’s fast, easy to use and widely available across a large global server network. In fact, it's our current pick for best premium VPN. One of the biggest drawbacks has always been its high cost, and this deal temporarily solves that issue. In our review we were...

item.title: I can’t find the Trump phone at America’s largest tech show
item.description: Where's the Trump phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, it's nowhere to be found at CES 2026. CES isn't a big smartphone show, but there have been more […]

item.title: I’ve tested the latest Switch 2 controllers, and this one is the best
item.description: If you choose to get an extra controller for your Nintendo Switch 2, you can spend a lot — and get a lot in return. Buying Nintendo’s own $89 Switch 2 Pro Controller, for instance, will net you the console’s only wireless controller with a 3.5mm headphone jack for private listening, not to mention great-feeling […]

item.title: Why Are Federal Agents Using GoPros, Smart Glasses, and Phones to Record Us?
item.description: "What happened to the police body cameras?" one Uber driver in Minnesota asked a Border Patrol agent.

item.title: I waited two years to get a PlayStation Portal, and now wish I’d bought one sooner
item.description: The PlayStation Portal is one of the most surprising gaming accessories I’ve owned in years.

item.title: CES: So very big, so little sustainability tech
item.description: Every third booth at CES showed off some new AI product or other. If you wanted to find a robotic lawn mower, throw a rock. Humanoid robots, smart locks and super thin TVs were everywhere. But if you went looking for sustainability products, you’re going to have to hunt a bit. Last year, the Sustainability section at the Las Vegas Convention Center had 20 booths. This year, there were 38, but that’s in part due to the combination of the energy and sustainability categories. So exhibitors like South Korea’s largest electric utility company, a nuclear power company from the same country and lot...

item.title: Première fois à l’intérieur de la Tesla Model 3 Standard à 36 990 € : le hold-up de l’année est confirmé
item.description: On s'attendait à une version "éco+", dépouillée, un peu triste. La réalité ? C'est tout l'inverse. La nouvelle Tesla Model 3 Standard, affichée à un prix agressif de 36 990 €, vient d'être aperçue au salon de Bruxelles. Et franchement, à part les enjoliveurs, il faut un œil d'expert pour voir la différence avec le haut de gamme.

item.title: Meta signs deals with three nuclear companies for 6-plus GW of power
item.description: Two smaller companies, Oklo and TerraPower, along with Vistra, a large energy company, just signed agreements with Meta.

item.title: Iconic Hubble Telescope Could Be Dead in 3 Years
item.description: The silver lining is that there may be a privately funded alternative in the works.

item.title: CES 2026 proved the PC industry is hosed this year
item.description: Dell's XPS 14 now costs over $2,000. An AMD executive predicts that PC builders will likely make piecemeal upgrades this year, instead of building entirely new systems. And new AI supercomputers from NVIDIA and AMD are gobbling up the RAM market. At CES 2026, it was hard not to notice the dire year ahead for the computing industry, one that will likely lead to higher prices and more limited availability for consumer goods across the board.Really, though, the show just confirmed what was apparent since RAM prices skyrocketed over the last few months, driven by demand from AI datacenters. As Sam...

item.title: The first sets with Lego’s new Smart Brick are now available for preorder
item.description: It may have been one of the smallest devices announced at CES 2026, but Lego's new Smart Brick was also one of the most talked about debuts of the show. We've recognized it as the "Best in show" in our CES 2026 awards, and following the Smart Play system's launch earlier this week, the first […]

item.title: J’ai joué aux LEGO avec la Smart Brick : les possibilités sont infinies, le coup de cœur est énorme
item.description: J'ai joué avec la LEGO Smart Brick et les sets Star Wars compatibles. Un plaisir simple, une belle idée et un coup de cœur énorme. Retour d'expérience.

item.title: Où précommander les nouveaux LEGO Star Wars connectés au meilleur prix ?
item.description: Vous aviez prévu de faire des économies en ce début 2026 ? C'est raté. Quelques jours après l'annonce choc du CES, LEGO vient d'ouvrir les vannes. Les trois premiers sets Star Wars Smart Play sont disponibles en précommande dès maintenant. Et comme prévu, la technologie, ça se paie.

item.title: ‘Black Mirror’ Will Bring More Dystopia to Our Dystopia With Season 8
item.description: Charlie Brooker's series will return to Netflix for another round of (inevitably) eerily timely episodes.

item.title: Soldes Fnac Darty : les meilleures offres à saisir avant le week-end
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver 2026 sont lancés ! Bien évidemment, la Fnac et Darty y participent. Les deux e-commerçants proposent des nombreuses offres très intéressantes du côté Tech et nous vous avons listé les meilleures d’entre elles pour vous aider dans vos recherches !

item.title: Baldur’s Gate 3 studio says it won’t use AI for concept art or writing
item.description: Following some controversy, the developers at Baldur's Gate 3 creator Larian Studios have further clarified their use of generative AI. CEO Swen Vincke and other Larian developers held an AMA on Reddit where they answered users' questions about the team's next title, Divinity. They also fielded questions related to reports that the studio was using […]...

item.title: If your best ChatGPT replies keep getting lost, this pin trick will change your life
item.description: A simple text-prompt workaround lets you pin, label, and save your best ChatGPT responses, stopping valuable AI insights from getting lost in long conversations.

item.title: Cdiscount met le paquet pour le week-end des soldes avec de belles promotions
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver sont aussi chez Cdiscount, et c’est le moment idéal pour craquer sur un nouveau produit Tech sans se ruiner. En plus des remises déjà généreuses, l’e-commerçant ajoute deux codes promo exclusifs pour faire encore baisser la note. On vous a sélectionné les meilleures offres à ne surtout pas manquer.

item.title: Record profits forecast for Samsung with dramatic increase in AI chip demand
item.description: Samsung's profits could increase by 3x year-over-year thanks to a surge in demand for memory chips.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : voici les meilleurs deals à saisir en DIRECT chez Amazon, Boulanger, Fnac, Darty…
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 viennent de débuter et pour l'occasion Boulanger, Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Cdiscount proposent une foule d'offres intéressantes. Smartphones, PC portables, téléviseurs, tablettes ou encore casques et écouteurs sans fil… Voici les meilleures offres Tech sélectionnées par la rédaction.

item.title: The Clicks co-founder explains who its tiny Communicator phone is for
item.description: Clicks is an apologetically gadgety company, making gear that feels charmingly out-of-place in a world where almost every smartphone out there is an all-screen slab. That was obviously two years ago when the company first revealed its keyboard case that brought tactile typing to the iPhone and eventually other Android devices. Rather than that being a one-off curiosity, the company had two new announcements at CES 2026: a magnetic keyboard accessory that also doubles as a battery bank and small, squat mobile phone with a keyboard. And while there isn’t a working prototype of the Clicks Communi...

item.title: Un mystère vieux de plusieurs décennies : James-Webb éclaire ce qui bloque la formation d’étoiles au cœur de la Voie lactée
item.description: La région de formation d’étoiles, nommée Sagittarius C (Sgr C), se trouve à environ 200 années-lumière du trou noir supermassif central de la Voie lactée, Sagittarius A*. Curieusement, il s'y forme moins d'étoiles que prévu. Les observations conjointes du James-Webb et du MeerKAT suggèrent une...

item.title: NASA Orders ISS Medical Evacuation—but Here’s the Real Surprise
item.description: The fact that Crew-11 is the first to leave the International Space Station early due to a medical issue is a testament to the safety of NASA’s human spaceflight program.

item.title: Democrats ask Apple and Google to remove X’s undressing bot from their app stores
item.description: Apple and Google are being dragged into the uproar around X's AI chatbot that has continued to virtually undress women in images without their consent this week. In a letter to Apple CEO Tim Cook and Google CEO Sundar Pichai, Sens. Ron Wyden (D-OR), Ben Ray Lujan (D-NM), and Ed Markey (D-MA) wrote that "X's […]

item.title: Amazon n’hésite pas à vendre au rabais de nombreux produits Tech lors des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver battent leur plein, et même si Amazon ne communique pas officiellement sur sa participation, de nombreuses offres et remises sont en ligne pour le week-end. C’est le moment idéal pour profiter de ces offres Tech à prix réduit et bien commencer l’année 2026.

item.title: Meta announces a slew of nuclear energy agreements
item.description: Meta has announced three new agreements to purchase nuclear power for its AI infrastructure as well as the Prometheus supercluster, a 1-gigawatt data center being built in Ohio. The social media giant is partnering with power companies Vistra, TerraPower and Oklo to deliver an expected 6.6 gigawatts of generation to its projects by 2035. The company's agreement with TerraPower will fund the development of two new reactors capable of delivering up to 690 megawatts of power as early as 2032. The deal also gives Meta rights to energy from six other reactors that could deliver an additional 2.1 gi...

item.title: "Americans should be concerned" – digital rights experts respond to the US withdrawal from internet freedom organization
item.description: Digital rights experts criticize the Trump administration's decision to withdraw from key international internet freedom organizations.

item.title: IBM's AI 'Bob' could be manipulated to download and execute malware
item.description: Bob is also susceptible to indirect prompt injection, but only under specific conditions.

item.title: Un prix salé pour la Steam Machine ? Un revendeur a peut-être vendu la mèche
item.description: Combien coûtera la Steam Machine ? Depuis la présentation de la nouvelle console de salon de Valve en fin d'année dernière, la question est sur toutes les lèvres, et le constructeur ne pipe mot malgré un lancement programmé ce premier trimestre. Un revendeur vient peut-être de griller la surprise… et elle n'est pas très bonne.

item.title: Notre top des meilleurs PC portables en 2026 : ultraportables, gaming et rapport qualité/prix
item.description: Vous êtes à la recherche d'un nouvel ordinateur portable ? Entre les MacBook, Zenbook, Dell XPS, Galaxy Book… il y a de quoi faire. Nous avons testé et comparé de nombreux modèles pour vous aider à trouver le meilleur PC portable, selon vos critères et budget.

item.title: Elon Musk Moves to Monetize Grok Deepfake Abuse, UK Calls It Insulting
item.description: It's a smokescreen solution to a problem that isn't going away.

item.title: All the tech and gadgets announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is upon us. All manner of companies descended on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew were on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we kept tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, LG showed off a wide array of TVs and Lego unveil...

item.title: Garmin's closest Apple Watch Ultra rival is getting a soft gold revamp
item.description: Sick of chunky, black Garmins? The sleek Venu X1 is going for gold in 2026.
